calltoaction.text: I offer customized web development solutions that boost your online presence and meet your business's specific needs.
calltoaction.title: Discover what I can do for you

workExperience.title: Some of my clients
workExperience.downloadTitle: If you want to know more, download my full CV

philosophy.title: Philosophy and Values
philosophy.text: To achieve excellence, you must be a lifelong learner.
philosophy.subtext: Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.

skillSet.title: Skills
skillSet.text: My skills are focused on offering comprehensive web development solutions to meet the needs and achieve the goals of my clients.

front.title: Web
front.description: I develop applications with complex front-ends that enrich the user experience, using state-of-the-art frameworks.

back.title: APIs
back.description: In the back-end, I use Node and Express technology, improving performance in high concurrency environments.

dataBase.title: Databases
dataBase.description: My experience covers both relational and non-relational databases, as well as their design, implementation, and management.

devOps.title: Cloud
devOps.description: I design robust and efficient infrastructures that meet the operational needs of projects.

leadership.title: Team Leadership
leadership.text: Behind every profile, there is a person with their fears, dreams, and concerns.
leadership.subtext: It's not about giving orders; it's about inspiring and guiding talent towards success.

references.title: This is what my colleagues say about me
references.subtitle: Constructive criticism is vital for achieving excellence, as it offers valuable perspectives and areas for improvement. Receiving objective and well-intentioned feedback fosters growth, allowing skills to be refined and mistakes corrected, thus driving continuous development.

jose.quote: Alejandro is one of the best professionals I have worked with. His dedication and effort to always meet his clients' needs are commendable.

diego.quote: I have known Alejandro for many years, he has always focused on his projects to the maximum, giving his best at all times.
diego.signature: Account Executive at Work With Island

eva.quote: It has been a pleasure to share my work experience with Alejandro, he always came up with disruptive and creative solutions to solve any problem.

maria.quote: Alejandro proved to be a technically solid professional, standing out for his initiative and ability to innovate, which was key to our team's success.
maria.signature: Digital Tech Director at Garaje de Ideas

ruben.quote: I was lucky to work under Alejandro's direction, he always motivated us to meticulously care for developments. I learned a lot from him.
